2718.text:
Add short names to the ClusterAPI CRDs to enable, e.g.:

#clusters
kubectl get cl

#machines
kubectl get ma

#machinesets
kubectl get ms

#machinedeployments
kubectl get md
2718.markdown:
Add short names to the ClusterAPI CRDs to enable, e.g.:

#clusters
kubectl get cl

#machines
kubectl get ma

#machinesets
kubectl get ms

#machinedeployments
kubectl get md ([#2718](https://github.com/kubermatic/kubermatic/pull/2718), [@toschneck](https://github.com/toschneck))

3111.text:
the users must set `service-account-signing-key` flag when running the kubermatic-api.
It must be a key with 32 bytes or longer. A user can generate this key using command: "openssl rand -hex 32"
The value for the `service-account-signing-key flag must be stored in `auth` section for `kubermtic` in values.yaml, for example:

kubermatic:
  auth:
    serviceAccountKey: "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
3111.markdown:
the users must set `service-account-signing-key` flag when running the kubermatic-api.
It must be a key with 32 bytes or longer. A user can generate this key using command: "openssl rand -hex 32"
The value for the `service-account-signing-key flag must be stored in `auth` section for `kubermtic` in values.yaml, for example:

kubermatic:
  auth:
    serviceAccountKey: "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" ([#3111](https://github.com/kubermatic/kubermatic/pull/3111), [@zreigz](https://github.com/zreigz))
3111.author: zreigz
